origins-plus-plus.light-mage.book.welcom:
Bem-vindo à Origem do Mago da Luz!

Há alguns feitiços ocultos, mas eles exigem itens específicos em sua mão livre para serem lançados. §(Lançar feitiços com [Primário] + [Shift])§r.
Abençoado com a proteção do Dragão Final
origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian.sword.l: Uma lâmina personalizada para a força de um guerreiro
origins-plus-plus.mouse.lore: §f Eu sempre fui uma enxada de madeira... §4Sobre o que você está falando?§r
origins-plus-plus.mouse.name: Yoinked!
origins-plus-plus.rift-mage.message: Você está se afastando demais da sua fenda!
origins-plus-plus.spirit-ram.sleep_fail: Você tem que dormir acima de Y = 70.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.black_con: Lance um gancho para se mover.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.blue_cond: Gera uma aura curadora capaz de curar você mesmo e os outros.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.light_blu: Invoca nanites para você, que te protegem contra todos os ataques.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.lime_cond: Invoca uma gaiola de metal para prender criaturas ou jogadores à sua frente.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.red_condu: Dispara lasers de seu bastão e destrói tudo em seu caminho.
origins-plus-plus.technomancer.staff.lor: Um poderoso cajado usado como meio para criar feitiços com conduítes...
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/a_: Tocar algas lhe dá Regeneração, Cegueira e Lentidão.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ad: Você pode respirar naturalmente debaixo d'água.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/co: Você não pode dormir acima de Y = 63!
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/dr: Kelp Desidratado me dá mais fome.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ex: Você é naturalmente três blocos de altura.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/fi: O fogo me traz más memórias, então você toma dano aumentado de fogo.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/go: Estar perto de um bloco de ouro ou de areia de almas te dá uma ótima velocidade.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/he: Você tem dois ouvidos a menos.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/lo: Você flutua por um tempo por toda vez que estiver com pouca vida (sem cair lentamente).
REJEITE A MORTE E RETORNE PARA ESPACIMANIDADE!
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/ne: Você é mais fraco e mais lento no nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/pa: Causar dano aos lobos lhe dá o efeito de uma poção de força por um tempo curto.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/po: Aplica o efeito de veneno no seu oponente por um pequeno período após acertá-los.
power.origins-plus-plus.alien-axolotl/tr: Você recebe mais dano de armas encantadas com Ruína dos Artrópodes.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/eternity: Tempo para você saber o que é preciso para existir e ainda não existir simultaneamente... (Previne dormir)
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/moons_gr: Você pertence à noite! Dê um salto, pegue uma espada e use o luar como seu aliado!
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/scorchin: A luz das estrelas em você te enfraquece muito durante o dia, tenha cuidado até o anoitecer.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/supernov: Seu corpo é feito de energia pura, então quer dizer que você é "meio" transparente e parece não ter osso algum?.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/time_spa: Anomalias são extremamente instáveis, mas você pode usar isto ao seu favor; você pode teleportar para onde quiser.
power.origins-plus-plus.anomaly/unstable: Devido ao seu estado instável seu corpo irá desaparecer gradualmente, causando fome.
power.origins-plus-plus.artificial-const: Você é uma máquina de guerra energizada por baterias. Esta bateria lentamente acaba ao decorrer do tempo. Conforme a bateria diminui, você começará a se mover lentamente até que não possa mais dar um passo. Você pode reabastecer esta bateria colocando carvão mineral, carvão ou redstone em sua mão.
Você pode atirar flechas de sua mão.
Já que você é uma máquina a sua recuperação não é natural, mas você pode curar-se com pepitas de ferro (aumento baixo) ou ferro/lingotes de cobre (aumento médio) em sua mão.
Já que a maioria do conteúdo da sua barriga é feito de mel e baba, você tem dano reduzido de queda.
Sua casca exterior é feita de metal, então você tem um pouco de armadura e uma tonalidade cinzenta.
Você não pode comer, mas sua fome nunca chegará a zero. Você é também imune a envenenamento.
Devido aos pistões em seus braços você tem alcance aumentado.
Você pode guardar itens em um compartimento parecido a um baú. Esses itens não caem quando você morre.
Você é muito mais denso do que a água te faz afundar.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/fireba: Você tem tanto uma barra de fogo como uma barra de água. Certifique-se de prestar atenção a elas!. Recarregue sua barra de fogo segurando carvão/carvão mineral/bloco de carvão/balde de lava e [Shift + Clique Direito]. Reabasteça sua barra de água bebendo garrafas de água ou segurando um balde de água e [Shift + Clique].
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/power_: Quando você esgotar qualquer uma das barras você entrará no modo de economia de energia.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/toggle: Você pode alterar entre ataques de fogo e água
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/undyin: Você não morre mas você enfraquecerá quando estiver sem vapor. (*Você tem uma barra de contagem que desaparecerá quando seu vapor acabar e se reabastecerá quando você tiver vapor. Se acabar, você morre.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/unnatu: Você não precisa comer. Você também não pode se recuperar naturalmente.
power.origins-plus-plus.automaton/water_: Esteja avisado! Isso usa muito vapor!
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/aquatic.d: Você tem a Graça do Golfinho quando embaixo d'água.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/lazy.desc: Você terá Fatiga de Mineração quando tiver mais do que uma pilha de troncos no seu inventário.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/lazy.name: Preguiça
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/logger.de: Você ganha pressa quando aproxima troncos e troncos descascados.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/rage.desc: Você ganha Velocidade e Regeneração por um curto período.
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/rage.name: Raiva do Castor
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/razor_tee: Você causa dano extra devido aos seus dentes afiados
power.origins-plus-plus.beaver/storage.d: Você pode armazenar itens valiosos na sua boca e que não cairão quando você morrer.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bedro: Você é tão denso que quando você cai mais do que quatro blocos você quebra o bloco em que você parou (exceto alguns blocos resistentes).
Já que você é mais forte do que a maioria, você pode quebrar uma base rochosa com uma picareta de netherita.
Você é quase inquebrável por conta dos seus antepassados. Você é imune a afogamento e fome. Você tem também uma tonalidade mais escurecida por conta de ser bedrock.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bow.d: Devido aos seus braços curtos você não pode puxar um arco ou uma besta para trás.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/bulky: Você é musculoso então você afunda na água e ganha lentidão.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/dense: Por conta da sua densidade você tem vida extra e é mais lento.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/fast_: Você foi construído para minerar, então você minera mais rápido.
Você se cura de uma maneira diferente, então você tem cura constante, mas metade de um coração a cada meio segundo.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/heavy: Devido ao seu peso você mal pode pular um bloco de altura.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/immob: Como seus ancestrais, você pode tornar-se imune a todo tipo de dano — no entanto, você abre mão da sua velocidade, força e demora muito mais para curar.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/knowi: Sua familiaridade com a terra te permite encontrar tesouros que os outros não vêem.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/lava_: Já que você está a maioria do tempo coberto em lava, você adaptou sua visão para enxergar.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/no_el: Por conta da sua densidade você nunca poderá voar.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/no_fo: Você nunca comeu então você nunca terá uma barra de vida cheia.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/potio: Sua pele é muito dura para que as poções sejam absorvidas e tenham efeito
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/power: Por conta da sua força extraordinária, você pode arremessar criaturas no ar quando bater nelas.
Você é um bloco de altura porque você era um bloco.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/sleep: Você descansou enquanto sentava nos confins do mundo, por que você precisaria de mais?
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/spawn: Você nasce no Nether, onde há o dobro de bedrocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/stron: Por você ser feito de bedrock, você causa dano extra quando usa o punho.
power.origins-plus-plus.bedrockean/sun_w: O sol brilha demais para seus olhos adaptados às cavernas.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/blast_: Binturongues são fracos ao dano de explosão
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/camouf: [Save Toolbar Activator] Você pode se camuflar no ambiente para se tornar invisível, você usará fome fazendo isso
Binturongues causam dano extra com suas garras afiadas
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/flamma: O couro dos binturongues é muito inflamável, o que causa a eles dano extra
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/jockey: Você pode montar em outros jogadores.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/jump_b: Binturongues podem pular mais alto do que a maioria
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/leap.d: Binturongues podem saltar de árvore em árvore com um poderoso salto
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/less_b: Os Binturongues precisam economizar energia para pular, por isso não conseguem segurar suas respirações por muito tempo
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/manic_: As garras de Binturongues permitem que eles quebrem blocos mais rápido que os outros.
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/noctur: Binturongues são adaptados para a noite e possuem visão noturna permanente
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/small_: Sendo um quadrúpede, binturongues são menores do que a média
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/sugar_: Binturongues podem resfolegar tinta vermelha por algum motivo
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/thick_: A pele grossa de um binturongue significa que eles são imunes a todos os tipos de espinhos e pontas
power.origins-plus-plus.binturong/too_he: Binturongues são muito fracos para vestir amarduras de netherite
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/almost_no_a: Birb é bem pequeno, o que o torna difícil o uso de qualquer armadura que não seja couro, ouro, malha e peitorais de ferro.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/feather_gri: Devido a suas asas fracas, você não pode carregar arcos ou bestas comumente, o que diminui a quantidade de dano que você inflige com flechas.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/granivore.d: Como um pássaro, você prefere comer sementes ao invés de outras comidas, então você só pode comer sementes.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/jockey.desc: Você pode montar em outros jogadores.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/jockey.name: Jóquei
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/launch.desc: Você pode sacudir as suas asas para te impulsionar para frente.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/launch.name: Sacudir
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/love_air.de: Você ama tanto voar que aprendeu como extrair o máximo disso, você causa duas vezes o dano enquanto voa, no entanto, você causa muito pouco dano enquanto estiver no chão.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/small.descr: Pássaros são pequenos, você é um pássaro então é pequeno também. Já que você é um pássaro, você também possui asas naturais!
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/small.name: Pequeno Pássaro
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/smaller_app: Como um pequeno pássaro, você não precisa comer tanto.
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/tweet.descr: [Save Toolbar Activator] Pássaros adoram repetir tudo ao seu redor, e agora com essa habilidade, eles podem encontrar de onde o som está vindo para saber onde estão as coisas por perto!
power.origins-plus-plus.birb/tweet.name: Tuíte
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/blazing_: Se jogue no ar e ganhe queda lenta até você atingir o chão.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/charge_b: Dispare uma enxurrada e cargas de fogo.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/cold_her: Quando estiver em um ambiente frio você ganhará muita lentidão e Fraqueza II é aplicada.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/fortress: Você nasce em uma Fortaleza Nether.
Uau! Esse lugar é uma droga...
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/hot_hand: Você não pode usar arcos, balestras e tridentes.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/no_place: Quando estiver no Nether você têm Velocidade II, Força, e nenhum monstro irá te atacar.
Não Há Lugar Como o Lar
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/overworl: Você ganha Fraqueza quando estiver no Overworld.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/particle: Partículas de Chamas saem do seu corpo.
power.origins-plus-plus.blazian/punch.de: Seu corpo é feito de chamas, para que os inimigos peguem fogo pelos seus punhos e você tenha chamas ao seu redor.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/amethyst_ea: Você pode comer blocos, agregados e fragmentos de ametista — por eles pensarem serem parte de você.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/blob_creatu: Você é tão alto quanto um zumbi, mas você tem menos corações.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/colour.name: Rosado.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/electrical_: De alguma forma, o raio passa por você sem causar dano.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/frozen_feet: Quando estiver em biomas gelados você ganhará velocidade por conta da sua pele de geleia, que congela e torna-se mais fácil de caminhar com ela.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/heal.descri: [Save Toolbar Activator] Aumente sua barra de vida ao ganhar cegueira + lentidão temporariamente.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/heal.name: Cura
Embora você ainda use corações normais, sua vida foi substituída por uma barra de saúde. Usar habilidades ou ser atingido faz com que a barra diminua constantemente.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/magic.descr: Você pode atirar uma parte de si mesmo (Isso usa 20% da sua barra de vida).
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/magic.name: Você Mesmo
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/melting_han: Suas mãos derretem em biomas mais aquecidos, te fazendo mais fraco.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/nether_weak: O nether é um lugar novo para você, então suas mãos enfraquecem um pouco, por conta do estresse que o lugar lhe dá.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/no_lungs.de: Apesar de ser fraco em água, você ainda não se afoga nela porque não precisa respirar.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/paranoia.de: Você é tão paranóico que quando você é atingido você ganha um pequeno impulso de velocidade.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/side_step.d: Clicar duas vezes em uma tecla de movimentação vai dar um impulso na mesma direção.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/stacking_at: Seu ataque dará um acúmulo em até 3 vezes, com 3 acúmulos seu próximo ataque causa mais dano e o acúmulo será redefinido após não atacar algumas vezes.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/storage.des: Você pode guardar coisas dentro de você e elas não caem quando você morrer.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/strength.de: Você é mais forte quando sua barra de saúde está mais que a metade.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/water_effec: Quando molhado, você começa a se transformar em uma espécie de poça, tornando-o mais lento e com mais fome.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/wisdom.desc: Você recebe 175% a mais de XP de todas as fontes. [Right-Click] enquanto segura um livro para ganhar 20 pontos de experiência.
power.origins-plus-plus.blob/wisdom.name: Sabedoria
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/delicio: O cheiro do bacon encoraja seus atacantes a causar muito mais dano. Tome cuidado ao redor do fogo!
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/glutton: Toda comida está muito mais saturada.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/hog_sou: Estar em estado Hog-Wild irá reproduzir faixas de áudio de vez em quando.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/hog_wil: Se estiver com metade da vida ou abaixo, você entrará em um estado de fúria que aumenta sua velocidade e dano de ataque.
Sua falta de dedos previne você de usar escudos e armas de projéteis.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/overwei: Seu apetite nada saudável te levou a não se mover mais devagar que o normal.
Seu ataque básico é muito mais forte do que a maioria.
power.origins-plus-plus.boarling/tough.d: Sua pele grossa e seu peso reduzem qualquer dano de repulsão ou dano de projéteis.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/clim: [Save Toolbar Activator] Você é rápido e está tranquilo, você pode escalar  blocos!
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/cobw: Ataque um alvo em uma teia de aranha, usando seu punho para se alimentar.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/curs: Você recebe mais dano de armas enctandadas com a Ruína dos Artrópodes.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/exos: Assim como as aranhas você está equipado com um exoesqueleto — uma carapaça dura, que fornece apoio estrutural e proteção contra predadores.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/extr: Por conta dos seus ancestrais, você ganha corações extras.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/long: As aranhas podem modificar sua velocidade com suas poderosas pernas, elas aumentam a distância que podem pular. Enquanto estiver correndo, você pula mais alto.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/mine: Você nasce em uma Mina Abandonada.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/pois: Seu corpo não reage ao veneno, pois é imune a ele.
Você libera veneno no toque. Injetando veneno nos outros quando você os atinge.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/silk: [Load Toolbar Activator] Você captura todo jogador e criatura em um raio de 10 blocos em uma teia de aranha.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/spid: Você naturalmente toma um pouco menos de dano.
Aranhas e Aranhas de Caverna são suas aliadas e não irão te atacar.
Sua anatomia permite que você seja mais forte.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/summ: Você pode invocar aranhas de caverna amigáveis.
power.origins-plus-plus.broodmother/web_: Lança uma teia na direção em que você estiver olhando. Causa dano se cair no mesmo bloco que uma entidade. (Você não pode usar botas e deve estar no chão para que funcione).
power.origins-plus-plus.calamitous-rogue: Matando withers, dragões ender, maldeões e golens de ferro te dão esmeraldas bônus. No entanto, outras entidades têm 20% de chance de soltar nada.
O Grande Caçador de Jogos
Os aldeões colocaram uma recompensa pela sua cabeça e eles não negociarão até que você use Lábia neles.
Alvo de Recompensa
Como um Assassino você sofre de dano reduzido, se a sua barra de furtividade não estiver cheia.
DPS Ruim
Coloque um marcador no seu pé. Se você matar algo enquanto estiver agachado, teleporte-se de volta instantaneamente.
Segredos da Troca
Você tem 33% de chance de instantaneamente restaurar 1 de durabilidade da sua arma, enquanto estiver batendo em alguma coisa (a não ser que a arma esteja com 1 de durabilidade).
Perito em  Armas
Golens de Ferro irão atacar você no momento em que você quebrar colheitas perto deles.
Infame
[Shift + Botão direito] em um aldeão para aumentar sua reputação com eles, mesmo que você seja Alvo de Recompensa. Se um aldeão estiver próximo após 10 segundos, golens de ferro começarão a te caçar.
Fala Mansa
When not attacking or taking damage, you slowly fade into shadows, eventually becoming invisible.
Stealth

Strikes while stealthed reset your bar, but gain an extra effect based on your held item:
- Axes shatter shields, dealing heavy damage to the item.
- Shields stun the victim for a short time and breaks their flight (if any).
- Swords strip any health-increasing status effects from the target.
- Tridents (melee only) deal drowning damage after a short delay.
Ambush
Ambush strikes make your victim glow for a medium duration for you.
Thrill of the Hunt
Your stealth bar refills instantly after scoring a kill.
Without a Trace
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/cake: You are able to craft a cake with 9 sugar in a crafting table
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/cook: Você pode criar um bolo com 4 açúcares em uma mesa de criação
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/favo: Comer cookies te dá mais saturação do que o normal
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/hard: Ganhar resistência temporariamente mas perder alguns pontos de comida
power.origins-plus-plus.candyperson/suga: Você não recebe dano de arbustos de bagas doces.
Você começa com alguns itens relacionados ao açúcar
Crie 9 açúcares com 9 bagas doces em uma mesa de criação
Quando você tiver açúcar na sua mão, você o come para obter efeitos de açúcar
power.origins-plus-plus.child-of-cthulhu: Você altera a cor da sua pele se estiver em água ou terra.
Você fica com fome mais vezes.
O fogo representa tudo que você é contra, então ele causa 3x de dano em você.
Você pode se lançar no ar, na direção que você estiver olhando.
Você pode alterar entre os tamanhos Pequeno, Normal e Grande.
Já que você se acostumou tanto com a água, você tem lentidão na terra(quando não estiver chovendo).
Você é feito para caçar monstros em mundos desconhecidos, então você não precisa de oxigênio.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/chimeri: You are heavily mutated and made for a high risk combat, you won't use shields as they slow you down. Fire is something you need to deal with as you are critically weak to it
Let loose your bioweapon to rot away whatever caught your ire.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/no_food: You are made to directly absorb material to repair yourself. Hurting something will restore hunger. However, you can't eat normal food as you are a synthetic creature
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/phase_s: You teleport after taking damage. (Up to once per minute)
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/schrodi: Your HP is cut in half under the sun, as it is uncertain your biology is living or dead.
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/unstabl: Made to adapt you take in potion effects one level stronger, however, this also applies to negative ones as you seem to be defective
power.origins-plus-plus.chimaera/xenite_: Eldritch metal cancels out any G-Forces on your body, making you immune to fall damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/cobras_tou: To defend yourself, you poison people you attack.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/cold_resou: Você não gosta de frio. Ficar em um local frio começará a baixar sua temperatura. Uma barra de frio começará a aumentar sua temperatura. Ter um pouco de frio lhe aplicará lentidão e uma pele levemente azulada. Atingir o frio máximo aumentará o nível de lentidão e o tom azulado, e você começará a sofrer danos. O frio diminuirá naturalmente depois que você deixar o local frio.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/green_skin: Your skin has turned green from the mass of scales covering your body.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/poison_sho: Shoots a Poison Arrow wherever you are looking at.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/scale_armo: Your scales provide natural protection, giving you 1 bar of armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.cobra/strength_i: You are naturally stronger because of the heat, you gain strength during the day and in the nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/def: You have a small permanent armor boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/no_: You cannot eat regular food. Instead, you can consume copper by placing it in your offhand. Raw copper gives 2 points, copper ingot gives 3, and copper blocks (+ unoxidised variants) give 10.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/oxi: You oxidize over time in three stages. The more oxidized you are, the slower and weaker you will become. Place honeycomb in your offhand, and it will be consumed to undo oxidation.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/sma: You are naturally half a block tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.copper-golem/str: You have a small permanent damage boost.
power.origins-plus-plus.corrupted-wither: Even thought you are a skeleton you still somehow need food and need it often...
You warp to another dimension becoming invulnerable to any kind of damage and become invisible, when enter/exiting the dimension you emit a sound.
You can cause any nearby projectiles to warp and slow down allowing you to dodge them with ease.
You are a wither skeleton and thus deal an extra heart of damage with any type of sword.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/axe.de: Learning from your family, you learned how to use axes more proficiently than others.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/crafti: Due to your specialization in crafting you don't require a crafting table to craft, being able to summon a crafting GUI.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/fire.d: Spending your time on the forge you became immune to heat and fire. You still take damage in lava.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/pillag: You take more damage from your natural enemy, the Pillagers.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/undead: However much you train, you aren't able to get over your fear of the undead.
power.origins-plus-plus.craftsman/villag: You lived a sheltered life, as such you didn't leave the village growing up. You spawn in a village.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/disloc: You can teleport anywhere within a 25 block range.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/mage_b: [Primary] + [Shift] You can turn a book in your offhand into a Mage Spell Book.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/recove: [Secondary + Shift] Use mana to heal yourself.
power.origins-plus-plus.dark-mage/resour: You have a mana bar which can be used to cast spells. If you run out of mana, you die.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/carry: [Shift + Left-Click] a minion to turn it into a Petrified Heart again.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/comma: Single out a mob for all of your minions to target.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/disco: Your blood sacrifices reduced your max health. Summoning minions reduces it even further, if you stay near them.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/equip: Your minions will automatically pick up items on the ground to use as gear.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/freez: [Shift + Right-Click] a minion to make it wait for you patiently, freezing it in place. Do it again to unfreeze a minion.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/join_: Mobs you summon won't attempt to attack you.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/night: Your SOUL bar regenerates slowly at night.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/no_me: You barely deal any damage with swords and axes.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/no_tr: Villagers refuse to trade with you.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/petri: Most hostile mobs you kill drop petrified hearts, containing their vital data. SOUL is needed to summon bound mobs.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/small: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can fire a ray of dark energy at will to deal light magic damage. The damage increases as your expertise in necromancy increases.
Like all occultists, you use SOUL energy for your demonic rituals. Accumulate it by killing mobs.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/speci: Sacrifice your vitality to unleash a special ability of all your minions within 8 blocks. You will receive a book detailing each. Requires your SOUL to be higher than 50%, but doesn't consume SOUL.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/summo: Using the power of 5 SOUL Energy and a petrified heart in your hand, summon its bound mob to serve you. Some mobs have special abilities that can be used at will.
power.origins-plus-plus.deathsworn/take_: When at least 2 minions are nearby, they will sacrifice themselves to protect you from a fatal hit, dying to do so.
As you are a (half) god, you are cursed by the underworld when you are in the nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/fire.de: Fire represents demons (your adversaries), so you take extra fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/god_pun: You are a skilled soldier, and therefore you possess abilities to gain strength for a short while.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/god_spe: Because of your nature, you are naturally faster than most (when not in the nether).
Because you are descended from gods, you have extra health.
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/more_bo: You are weakened and take more damage from the gods themselves (the bosses).
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/phase.d: You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.demi-god/raw_die: You can only eat raw food.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/arrow_e: Any arrow you shoot will inflict slowness II on the target.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/breathi: Você se acalma, esvazia a mente e começa a respirar. A respiração diminui sua barra de desarranjo em 25.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/dart.de: You can launch 3 darts anywhere in the direction you are looking. This dart will cause Slowness II.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/derange: Killing something increases your derangement bar by 25. That's pretty gross man.

You have a deranged bar, there are different effects for different levels of derangement. You fill up your derangement bar by killing something. However, to decrease your derangement bar, you use your breathing ability.
When your derangement bar is over or equal to 75, you will go insane. While insane, you deal extra damage, but your mental state is so broken that you are only left with 4 hearts to spare.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/knife_l: You have an obsessive love for sharp and pointy things such as knives, so you became well versed on how to fight with them. The damage you do with swords adds an extra heart of damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/migrain: The world looks a little bit different when you're insane. Literally.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/nightma: You have horrible nightmares when you fall asleep, because of this you've stopped sleeping altogether.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/persuas: You've learned to convince and persuade many people over the years. Now, you can now use this to haggle with villagers to lower your prices.
power.origins-plus-plus.deranged/tranqui: When your derangement bar is lesser than or equal to 25 it will put you in a tranquil state. While tranquil, you are as fit as a fiddle. Being tranquil gives you Speed 2 and Jump Boost 1.
power.origins-plus-plus.devine-architect: Many attempted to take your powers by attempts at your life. You've became paranoid, unable to trade with villagers and unable to interact with some passive and neutral mobs. Iron Golems have grown wary of your presence through the years, now they attack you on sight!
Distrust

You mine end materials faster than others, and you can always pick up end blocks regardless of the tool you're using. You can also craft stone tools, brewing stands, furnaces, and levers with end stone.
Resourceful
[Load Toolbar Activator] Teleport to your exact position in the end
Dimensional Traveler (End)
Your energy is shown. You use this to activate the Universal Blast. This fills faster at night than at day.
Energy
You can float (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
Float
The Bosses are jealous of your abilities and wish to obtain them - even if they have to kill you to do so... (Bosses do more damage to you)
Jealousy
[Save Toolbar Activator] Teleport to your exact position in the nether
Dimensional Traveler (Nether)
You can see better at night.
Night Vision
You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
Phase
You can shoot a beam of condensed universal energy.
Universal Blast
Regeneration works differently for your kind.
Unnatural Regeneration
Since you are in the water so much, you get bubble particles around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/fish_die: You can only eat fish, but it gives a lot more hunger bars than usual.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/ocean_sp: Your natural spawn is in the ocean.
Like a dolphin you can jump out of the water.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/slow_lan: Because you are not used to being on land you get Slowness and Weakness while not in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/speed_wa: Dolphins are really fast swimmers, causing you to have Speed II while in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/summon_d: Dolphins usually travel in groups, causing you to be able to spawn a dolphin.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/water_br: Due to the way your lungs are formed you can hold your breath underwater permanently.
power.origins-plus-plus.dolphin/water_vi: Dolphins can see underwater due to the way their eyes were made.
power.origins-plus-plus.drakonwither/wit: You are immune to the wither effect thanks to your (part) wither heritage.
You can shoot a wither skull where you are looking.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/abiliti: [Load Toolbar Activator] You can stab a chain into your enemies dealing bleed damage
Conjure a speedy nightmare steed that will either last 2 minutes or dies when you die.
You can shoot the skulls of your enemies laced with the soul of a creeper.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/buffs/f: Even your presence is scary, making enemies blinded with fear.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/buffs/k: You always carry items with you gathered on your journeys as a horsemen.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/buffs/n: Your way stronger during the night due to your mission to hunt down souls however the daytime weakens you making you thirst for souls insatiable.
As a horsemen, you can't eat anything - only being able to absorb the souls in soul campfires and soul lanterns to give you nutrients.
power.origins-plus-plus.dullahan/debuffs: When hit, you have a chance of dropping bones.
Any items imbued with a curse can seal you inside the weapon when you are hit and kill you
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/bac: [Load Toolbar Activator] Leave your spiritual form, becoming one with the rock once more.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/ign: You are as heavy as a rock. You immediately sink upon being in contact with water.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/inv: You are close to invisible to the human eye.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/pha: You are in your spiritual form, so you can phase through blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/roc: Your skin has adapted itself to look like stone.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/spi: As a spirit-being you are faster than the average person, but you deal almost no damage.
Everything you see is desaturated until you take form again.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/sto: Being rock-like you become one with the rocks. You gain strength, resistance, and slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.earth-spirit/swi: [Load Toolbar Activator] Leave your rock body and become spiritual.
Your Blood Meter fills up with every kill, upon reaching a certain number of kills, you will unlock abilities, but you will lose those abilities if the Blood Meter drops down below the set value for that ability. You lose blood by taking damage, this is called 'Bleeding'.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/distor: Gives blindness and nausea to players within 5 blocks. Kill 120 mobs to use this ability.
You are able to dodge and teleport back. Kill 100 mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/ebon_e: You have natural fire resistance and speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/fly.de: You can launch yourself into the sky. Kill 100 mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/last_r: When you die, you instantly cause an explosion.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/nether: As you feel more at home in the crimson forest, your natural spawn becomes the underworld.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/resist: Due to the nature of your abilities, you've grown immune to the effects of wither, nausea, and blindness.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/smite_: You take significantly increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with smite.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/uncomf: It is impossible for you to sleep above Y = -20.
You gain wings that make you immune to fall damage and allows you to glide. Kill 100 mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.ebon-wing/wither: [Save Toolbar Activator] Gives Wither effect to players within 5 blocks. Kill 120 mobs to use this ability.
power.origins-plus-plus.emblazing-warrio: At 3 fury, you can no longer see your health.
Clouded Judgement
At 3 fury, you will begin burning.
Red Hot Chili

You are able to unleash a strong attack in a X-shaped cross in front of you, dealing damage to everything inside, including you. The attack's shape will change to a '+'-shaped cross upon reaching 3 fury.
X-Slash
You get hungry faster than the average person.
Demanding Lifestyle
X-Slash deals less damage to you than to other mobs. You also take less damage from being set on fire. With 3 fury, you will not take damage from X-Slash or burning.
Burning Blood
For each 25% HP lost, you will gain fury, which increases all of your powers' effectiveness.
Flaming Fury

Whenever you attack with at least 1 fury, there is a 33% chance to ignite mobs to your left or right side. At 2 fury, this will ignite enemies on both sides at a 66% chance. At 3 fury, the chance of this activating increases to 95%.
Ignition
You take slightly more damage from entities if you have less than 2 Fury.
Uncontrollable
The higher your fury is, the more damage you deal with attacks.
Torrent of Abuse
In the world you came from, you never earned EXP from killing mobs. You gain coins instead; after you gain enough coins, you can get an emerald.
Different World
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/end_rag: [Secondary + Shift] You can give strength and speed to everyone near you with your. (6 Block Range)
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/mage_bo: You can turn a book into a End Book using [Primary + Shift] with a book on your offhand.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/resourc: You have a mana bar if you run out of mana you die. Mana Bugs will teleport to you if your mana is low.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/telekin: You can use telekinesis to attack your enemies.
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/telepor: You can teleport wherever you want. (50 Blocks Range)
power.origins-plus-plus.end-mage/tp_to_y: [Primary + Shift] You can teleport players, mobs or items to you. (50 Blocks Range)
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/behind_yo: [Save Toolbar Activator] Nothing can evade you... Use this ability to teleport behind anyone.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/clone.des: Summon a clone at your place and become invisible. If it is hit, become visible again and create an explosion that deals damage at the clone, killing it. Press the same key while your clone is alive to kill it.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/hated.des: They all betray us. Villagers won't trade with us, and we can't tame anyone.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/no_fighti: Você só pode encarar as pessoas até a morte. Nada de espadas ou machados...! Mas você também pode socar as pessoas até a morte.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/phase.des: You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/sight.des: Sneak to see all players, even through walls. You also have permanent night vision.
power.origins-plus-plus.enigma/staring.d: Staring at an entity for a long enough time will kill it. When you begin looking at it, it'll gain slowness & weakness. Later on, your stare will inflict blindness and nausea.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/arm: You have strong arms and can mine stone with your fist.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/blo: Due to your demonic nature, you are strong.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/dea: You can shoot a wither skull.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/ely: After you died, you lost your wings but you will soon find out that you won't need them... (Invisible Elytra)
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/fir: The feel of fire brings you back to your suppose-to-be torture in hell, so you take more damage from fire.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/fra: You only have 8 hearts from all the torture in hell.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/glo: You are glowing due to your immense demonic energy.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/has: You are very strong, giving you haste.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/imm: You are immune to Wither, Poison, Nausea, and Instant Damage from enduring so much pain in hell.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/roo: The thought of being back in that horrid place still haunts you, so you don't like to be under roofs, being a little slower in such cases.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/tra: You are Translucent due to you being a demon.
power.origins-plus-plus.fallen-angel/vel: You can launch yourself due to your forced conditioning in Hell, forming a withering dust cloud as you launch.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/feline: Your legs not only make you jump higher but let you run faster
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/ravens: Your raven heart allows you to camouflage and become invisible when shifting.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/scaven: Your scavenger nature allows you to find ways to store items and preserve them.
power.origins-plus-plus.felvaxian/unholy: Your raven-like aura makes your skin dark and black. It also scares away any pets and villagers won't trade with you.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/bloodsuckin: By punching your victims while NOT crouched, you can drain their blood and receive healing, saturation, or a small buff. This is your only way to feed.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/diseased_bi: By punching your victims while crouched, you can afflict them with a random negative effect.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/inch_tall.d: You're barely 3 pixels tall. Drink some milk. Or blood. Either works. Actually, no, only blood does.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/jockey.desc: You can ride on other players.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/jockey.name: Jockey
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/nimble.desc: Being small has its perks. Prickly plants, high falls, and crash landings don't hurt.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/nimble.name: Nimble
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/small_heart: Being a miserable tiny insect means you only have four hearts of health.
power.origins-plus-plus.flea/small_stoma: You do not need much food to keep going.
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/burn.descri: Quando você se expõe ao sol, desidrata e começa a se queimar se ficar exposto por muito tempo. Você pode se reidratar com água.
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/burn.name: Dehydration
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/dash.name: Jump
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/poison.desc: Your skin produces a toxin that you can use to poison others.
power.origins-plus-plus.frog/poison.name: Powerful Toxin
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/floral_supe: You gain Regeneration, Saturation and Speed when around a group of 3 or more flowers.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/floral_team: Your bond with flowers and nature means they give you their strength when you are around them. Different flowers offer different effects.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/fungal_enem: Though you created them, you aren't exactly friends with Fungi. They do their best to hinder you when you're around them.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/light_as_a_: You're as light as a flower giving you slow falling whenever you please.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/natures_dan: You are more at risk to dying from drowning, withering, and burning!
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/photosynthe: You can regain hunger from the sun.
You are naturally smaller in size, being the size of a lovely rose.
power.origins-plus-plus.gaia/thorned_pun: You have thorns all over your body, and the ones on your fists are designed to have a weak poison.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/fire_charg: You're able to shoot a fireball. The cooldown is drastically reduced in the nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/float.desc: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can float (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/float.name: Float
Your melee attacks are weaker due to your depressed nature.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/nether_pha: Being a ghost you can phase through blocks, though you can only do this in the nether and you can't phase through obsidian.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/tall.descr: You are slightly taller than the average player.
power.origins-plus-plus.ghast/tall.name: Tall
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/armor.desc: Leather armor gives you as much protection as iron armor.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/armor.name: Giant Heritage
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/big.descri: You're twice the size of a regular person.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/big.name: Super Sized
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/bow.descri: Bows and crossbows break after use.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/bow.name: Excessive Power
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/breath.des: You have twice as much oxygen.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/health.des: You have twice as much health.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/limbs.desc: You jump twice as high, have 33% more reach, projectiles go twice as far, and you don't slip on ice.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/limbs.name: Long Limbs
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/mount.desc: Other players can ride on top of you, you can pick up mobs, and you can throw your passenger.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/mount.name: Piggyback
You're unaffected by levitation, but incapable of using an elytra.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/slam.descr: You can slam into the ground, creating a small explosion and throwing off passengers.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/slam.name: Colossal Slam
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/sleep.desc: You need to put 4 beds together to sleep.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/sleep.name: Gigantic Bed
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/slow.name: Unwieldy Arms
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/strong.des: You deal 33% more melee damage and 50% more knockback.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/sturdy.des: You take 50% less fall damage, 33% less knockback, and mine 50% faster.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/swim.descr: You fall 50% faster than normal, can't float in water, and can't ride any animals or vehicles.
power.origins-plus-plus.giant/swim.name: Heavy
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/chilly_p: If you're inside powder snow, you don't take freezing damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_blo: When in hot biomes and Nether, you cannot use your special abilities.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_fee: You are able to walk on water by turning it into ice.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_nap: You can't sleep when it's not cold enough. The head of your bed needs to be adjacent to at least 3 blocks that belong to snow or ice block tags.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_pro: Powder Snow drops your temperature down enough for you to survive in hot environments for a few minutes.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/cold_ski: Your cold nature makes your skin blue.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/freezing: When you deal critical damage, your touch temporarily freezes the target. If the target is resistant to fire, it takes 2.5 hearts from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/harvest_: You're able to collect Snow and Ice with your bare hands. However, you still need to use a bucket to collect Powder Snow.
You do not like sun's hot rays which makes you weaker during the day.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/icy_brea: You can breathe ice, freezing enemies and dealing a little bit of damage to them.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/icy_defe: Due to you having to exercise to keep yourself warm you have 1 armor bar filled.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/icy_spaw: You spawn in a Ice Spikes biome.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/multi_sn: If you throw a snowball when sneaking, it is split into 10. Snowballs also do more damage to opponents.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/night_pe: You like the cold night making you powerful at night time.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/overheat: When in hot biome, you're getting slower, weaker and you start dying. You can prevent this by getting inside powder snow, drinking a fire resistance potion or staying in water, but you're still slow and weak.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/snow_dam: Falling on snow prevents you from taking fall damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.glacier/snowy_sp: When on snow and ice, you are able to run extremely fast.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/carrion_ea: You do not suffer from the hunger condition, and in fact benefit from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/carrion_sa: You do not suffer from the hunger condition, and in fact benefit from it.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/large_buil: You tower over humans, making their armour too small for you
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/night_visi: When exposed to moonlight you can see clearly at night.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/rage.descr: Being reduced to under half your health will send you into a rage, increasing your knockback resistance, speed, and toughness.
power.origins-plus-plus.gnoll/rage.name: Rage
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/ext: You have a small damage bonus.
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/gol: You take on a gold-like color.

You have a power bar that goes up to ten. With [Primary], You can use three to increase speed temporarily, or with [Primary + Shift], you can use five to increase strength. If the bar is max, it is like holding a totem of undying.
You gain extra buffs depending on how much health you have.
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/hea: You have a bar that will heal you if above 20. The max is 50. Getting hit lowers the bar by 5. You have no need to eat. You can spend 20 power to use an ability that give you resistance and slowness.
power.origins-plus-plus.golden-golem/wat: You sink in water. You will also move slower, however you will not drown.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/absorben: Since your body passively absorbs water over time, being in water causes you to become slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/condensi: You're able to condense yourself to a quarter your usual size, but due to your high density (and smaller legs), you become slower.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/flammabl: Your chemical composition makes you extremely flammable, and thus you take increased fire damage, and can only be put out with water or powder snow.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/gooey_bo: Thanks to your body being an in-between of a solid and a liquid, it's more difficult to hurt you, and you take less damage from physical attacks and projectiles.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/gooey_fi: Because you are not entirely solid, you deal reduced damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/gooey_sk: Your gooey skin makes you green and somewhat translucent.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/ignitabl: You cannot wear iron armor or above in deserts, the nether, and other hot biomes or else risk being set on fire from the heat. You can protect yourself from this by enchanting your armor with Fire Protection.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/no_lungs: Having to survive in space, you've adapted to have no need to breathe air, and are able to go underwater without the fear of drowning.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/splat.de: You take less velocity damage, but if the potential damage is severe enough, you become slow while you try to put yourself back together.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/sticky_g: With your sticky skin, you're able to climb walls.
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/stomach_: You have increased saturation from meats thanks to how your body breaks down the matter and you don't get hunger or poison status effects. (You have no natural regeneration and you will always be at half hunger - eating food directly refills your hearts. You cannot eat when you are at full health).
power.origins-plus-plus.goolien/unwieldy: Your non-solid skin means that you cannot used shields or any ranged weapons.
power.origins-plus-plus.half-wither/exha: Because your body is half-wither, your Soul needs more energy to stay stable.
power.origins-plus-plus.half-wither/immu: You are immune to the effects of other withers.
power.origins-plus-plus.half-wither/soul: You feed off the souls of those you kill.
power.origins-plus-plus.half-wither/with: Shoot wither skulls at your target.
power.origins-plus-plus.hellforged/heat_: You take damage if you aren’t on fire or submerged in lava.
power.origins-plus-plus.hellforged/imper: You can see in lava much better than a normal human.
power.origins-plus-plus.hellforged/slow_: You swim slowly and take damage while in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.hellforged/stron: Because of your powerful metal arms, you can swim through lava with ease.
power.origins-plus-plus.hellforged/super: Because of your incredibly hot body, your attacks instantly set enemies alight.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/blue_tr: Since you're made of ice you're blue and slightly transparent!
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/cold_po: When you are in any cold biome, you will get buffs.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/freeze_: You don't take any freezing damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/frostwa: You can toggle frost walker, with a 3 minute stamina, then a recharge time.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/heal_ne: You will heal when near a snow golem
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/hot_bio: Your body doesn't like warm environments making you loose hunger faster, and be more weak.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/pyropho: You take more damage from everything fire, including lava, lightning, explosions, and fireworks.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/unresol: When you respawn, your size gets randomly chosen between 3 and 1 blocks tall. Your max health is affected by your size as well.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-king/warp.de: Warp to the entity you are looking at. If you miss then it will warp you to the closest entity.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/co: In cold biomes, you gain more speed, and in hot biomes you gain hunger.
You cause water to freeze around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/ic: You deal slightly more damage when hitting with an empty hand.
You spawn in a snow biome.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/mu: Fire several spikes that slow enemies.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/sm: You one block tall but can jump and run faster and higher than most.
power.origins-plus-plus.ice-porcupine/va: Using your demonic powers, you manipulate your ice to bend light around you, going invisible for a short time.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/blue_tra: Since you're made of ice you're blue and transparent!
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/cold_pow: you are buffed in cold biomes.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/cold_spe: You deal more damage over all in cold biomes.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/harvest_: You're able to collect snow and with your bare hands.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/hot_biom: Your body doesn't like warm environments making you loose hunger faster when in warm biomes like deserts or the Nether.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/nib.desc: Since you're small you are immune to multiple things
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/nib.name: Small
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/no_hunge: As you are smaller, you do not need to eat as much.
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/shard.de: You can shoot shards of ice
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/snow_spa: Since you're made of ice you spawn in a snow biome
power.origins-plus-plus.iceling/water.de: You get water breathing as you have no nose.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/archdem: As an archdemon, you are 25% larger and have longer arms.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/brawler: Your proficiency in ranged weapons is significantly compromised due to your massive and clumsy arms so your ranged damage is halved.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/crimson: Your hellspawn origins gives you a red hue.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/diaboli: As a demonic being, both hunger and gravity are trivial to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/extingu: The water extinguishes your flames, slowing you. You also cannot swim as you lack buoyancy.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/hades_h: Launch your self into the air. While you are in Wrath mode, a much shorter cooldown is used instead.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/hades_t: The earth will tremble, and your enemies shaken to their very core. Hold to launch yourself downwards, and demolish those fools who dare stand on your ground.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/heavywe: Your armored body comes at the cost of speed.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/ignisia: Unleash the power that the gods once feared. Rampage through your enemies and gain a shorter cooldown for the 'Hades Hopper' ability. All attackers get hit by guaranteed thorns (can stack with normal thorns) and set on fire. Take 80% less damage, move 50% faster and resist knockback. Consumes 100 Zenith points when hit and 4 Zenith points every tick while active.
You are the Zenith of all, none can stand in your way. Take damage to fill the 'Ignisian Zenith' bar. You regenerate health every 3 seconds of varying amplification depending on how full the bar is.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/inferna: As inhabitants of Hell, Hellfire is ineffective against you. In fact, you thrive in those scorching flames.
A larger size warrants a larger jump. You can jump half a block higher with your powerful legs.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/predato: As a predatory demonic being, you can only consume the flesh of your prey.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/punishe: The retribution has weakened you greatly. Explosions, magic and lightning bolts deal 3x damage to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.ignisian/sluggis: Your sluggish arms affect your break speed and attack speed by 25%
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/arrow: You can shoot a blindness arrow
All is Not as it Seems
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/bette: Because you are so manipulative, you can play with peoples heads. You can shoot a beam giving the target nausea.
All is Not as it Seems
Spawn [4] copies of yourself. To remove the illusion press [Save Toolbar Activator].
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/bow_a: Because you are trained with bows, they do more damage
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/bow_m: Because you are now a master with bows, they do even more damage
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/frien: Pillagers, who are usually foes, are now friendly to you (as you are one of them).
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/illus: Spawn [2] copies of yourself. To remove the illusion press [Save Toolbar Activator].
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/scary: Iron golems will attack you on sight.
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/sword: You are inexperienced at using swords, so they do less damage
power.origins-plus-plus.illusioner/villa: Because you are a pillager, villagers won't trade with you
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/ankle_bit: You gain life by hitting other entities.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/flap.desc: When jumping in the air, you are launched slightly in the direction of your cursor. You also glide for a short time after.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/flap.name: Flap
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/height.de: You are the smaller than the average person due to evolution.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/lava.name: Insect's Step
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/rain_slow: You are very small, water slows you down.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/speed.des: Your small stature allows you to move quicker.
power.origins-plus-plus.insect/water_slo: You are very small, so water slows you down.
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/aquati: You find dried kelp delicious and nutritious!
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/dry.de: You'll dry out if you're to long out of water.
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/little: You are a tiny little blob.
power.origins-plus-plus.jellyfish/stinge: Your touch paralyzes and poisons upon contact.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/aqua_po: Your heart of the sea core let's you use a nautilus shell on your neck (head slot) to breathe on land.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/conduit: With your core being a heart of the sea, you permanently have the effects of a conduit when in water.
With all the random items floating around in the waters, you got used to picking up random things near you (pickup range doubled). You also sink to the bottom of bodies of water due to not knowing how to actually swim (speed affected by depth strider).
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/lunge.d: You can perform an aquatic dash to better traverse the ocean.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/mobile_: [Save Toolbar Activator] You are able to grant nearby players (15 blocks) with 3 minutes of Conduit Power.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/no_helm: You can't wear helmets Due to your kelp frills and your heart of the sea core needing to be exposed on your head. You also need to have your bed near water to be able to sleep without going dry.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/shell_e: Use while holding a nautilus shell to put it in your helmet slot
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/standin: Your Heart of the sea core can tap into the energies of raw prismarine blocks, giving you strength and speed while standing on it.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/thin.de: You are thinner than others, making you able to fit in tight spaces.
power.origins-plus-plus.kelperet/water_v: [Load Toolbar Activator] With your core being a heart of the sea, you permanently have the effects of a conduit when in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/cat_size.d: You are cat sized; a block tall.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/climb.desc: [Save Toolbar Activator] You are fast at will and can climb blocks.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/climb.name: Climb
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/dislike_of: You hate the water, gaining Slowness and Weakness.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/jump_boost: You can launch yourself due to your strong legs and nature.
power.origins-plus-plus.kirin/unrivaled_: As a special ability, you gain high speed for a short time
You get slowness 2 while on land.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/gill_: You can breathe on land and in water.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/greed: You get hungry 1.5x faster, and get the hunger effect on land.
power.origins-plus-plus.land-shark/speed: You get dolphins grace while submerged in water.
[Secondary + Shift] You can give saturation, regeneration and resistance to everyone within 6 blocks.
[Primary + Shift] You can turn a book into a Mage Book with a book on your offhand.
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/clear: [Primary + Shift] You can remove status effects from entities within 12 blocks.
You can cast a healing spell that deals damage to the undead (Range: 80 blocks)
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/dimin: You can cast a Debuff spell that also affects you. (Range: 80 blocks)
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/mage_: [Primary] + [Shift] You can turn a book in your offhand into a Mage Spell Book.
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/illum: You can make all entities within 80 blocks glow and you give night vision to those within 8 blocks by using [Secondary + Shift].
power.origins-plus-plus.light-mage/resou: You have a mana bar - If you run out of mana you die.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/l: You can launch yourself 20 blocks into the air.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/p: Due to you being an old draconian, you maintained the attributes you had when you was alive.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/r: Despite being strong, you were a runt, smaller then most in your species. You're only a little taller then a block.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/s: Your used to the cold of the end and your not used to the overworld, After staying out in the sun for too long, you get Slowness I.
You are used to falling down large gaps when injured with your wings, due to being a ghost now it doesn't hurt anymore.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/t: The draconian race was the smaller cousins of the enderians, they both could teleport short distances
Your skin is translucent due to you being a spirit and slightly purple
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/u: Fire isn't something you had in the end, therefore you take 2x fire damage.
power.origins-plus-plus.lost-draconian/w: You deal extra damage with your sword due to your past being a warrior in the end.
Due to your small nature, your health was weakened. you have two less hearts
As a member of the draconian army, you were blessed with your own sword and shield which were personalised for yourself, however due to their age, they are now quite fragile.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/chain: Shoot chains in the directions you are looking at. They will penetrate through all mobs in their path. All mobs affected will get the wither effect. Use [Shift] too to make it so if this chain comes in contact with the ground, it will cause an explosion.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/curse: You take increased damage that ignores armor from weapons enchanted with Smite.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/exile: Villagers prices are heightened and iron golems attack you on sight.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/from_: [Load Toolbar Activator] Your inherent ability to perform necromancy allows you to call forth an armored skeleton, and an armored zombie, from beyond the grave to fight along your side.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/no_da: You take damage from water but only during the day.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/pluck: Because the iron is very conductive, it makes it so the sword is fueled with dark energy, making it deal as much damage as a netherite sword.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/summo: You summon evoker fangs on up to 3 nearby enemies, but only at night!
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/sunli: Your skin is fragile when it comes to daylight, causing you to burn when under it. The longer you stay under it, the weaker and slower you get.
power.origins-plus-plus.lunar-path/weake: You take double damage from all mobs.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/antivore: Your body cannot digest any kind of food, only absorb lava.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/bouncy.d: You bounce on any block as if it was a Slime Block
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/drop_loo: When hit, you have a small chance of dropping magma cream.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/lava_fee: While unable to eat typical foods, by submerging yourself in lava you can refuel.
power.origins-plus-plus.magmean/no_fall_: Kinetic damage is absorbed by your gelatinous form and does no harm to you.
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/call: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can teleport the last entity you punched to you. Use [Shift] too to teleport to it instead.
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/floa: You can float (but it's too exhausting to fly for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/part: You naturally have particles around you.
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/phas: You can pass through blocks (but it's too unstable to phase for long).
power.origins-plus-plus.malfunction/rand: When you take damage from anything other than water, you'll randomly teleport.
power.origins-plus-plus.manipulator/cycl:
You can wield various types of magical attacks. Cycle through the different abilities by using [Secondary]. Use [Primary] to activate an ability. Every ability uses up a specific ammo type (see below) - put items in your offhand to be use as ammo.

§nOFFENSIVE ABILITIES:§r
§fAnti-Gravity Arrow§r

Can pass through mobs and blocks except bedrock, barriers and obsidian types. You fly faster, and to descend/ascend you can double-tap space for creative flight. Consumes 2 Spectre points every tick. If deactivated: Gain strength 3 for 1 second.

power.origins-plus-plus.spectre/water_lo: The density of water restricts your movements. You swim three times slower.
